title: Grand Canyon National Park: Family Programs
body: Junior Ranger Family Programs         Families participate in a ranger-led program   If you're working to earn a Junior Ranger Badge on the North or South Rim you must attend one ranger-led activity in order to fulfill your requirements. You may attend any ranger program to finish your book. During the summer months, special programs are offered geared specifically towards families with kids. View the schedule of ranger-led programs.
